== About Me ==

Hi, I'm Mehdi Hassanpour. I am a 28 years old proud Iranian Ubuntu user, and I've studied Metallurgy engineering (Bsc) and also studing Computer Software engineering. I'm maintainer, main author and admin of <nowiki>[[http://www.hezardastan.org|Persian Documentaion for *nix]]</nowiki>. I'm an Ubuntu Community Member. You may read my daily writings and view shots at <nowiki>[[http://ImPersian.com|My Diary]]</nowiki>.

I work for EX-IBM company in Tehran and now working on IBM's DB2 & Websphere on OS390 & Z/OS. I have a plan to start developing Ubuntu for IBM's S390 & ZSeries, let me know if there are any volunteers or started projects in this field for Ubuntu...

I'm also a member of Iranian Telecommunication Research Center (ITRC) technical committee, that works as Iranian Ministry of Information & Communication Technology's research center.

<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/people/mehdi|My launchpad page]]</nowiki> & I'm <code>MehdiHassanpour</code> on network irc.freenode.net

== Homa Magic Add-On CD ==
Homa is an Add-On CD for Ubuntu (no kubuntu, Xubuntu yet). It has a GUI Installer. Homa will upgrade your installed ubuntu with the latest packages from ubuntu repositories come on CD and Install more than 60 packages on you ubuntu box with just 2 clicks.
